Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
User management involves a lot of tasks, reaching from configuring default user preferences to setting up organizational units and assigning roles and groups to users. Not to forget about permission handling. How to manage users is - at least partly - covered in several topics.

  • User management is mainly done via the "Administration view".Â Here you get an overview on this view.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview on the various facets of user management.
